title: Tesla Inc. stock rises Monday, outperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       rallied 1.39% to $177.77 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.12% to 38,769.66 and the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       falling 0.41% to 16,019.27. Tesla Inc. closed $121.52 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (85.0 M) remained 21.4 million below its 50-day average volume of 106.3 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The S&P 500 is up almost 50% since October 2022.
